About.title: About Me
About.text: I have skills in semantic, valid, adaptive, cross-browser, Pixel Perfect layout, using BEM, SCSS, Gulp. Most of my time writing code using tools such as TypeScript/JavaScript, React JS, Redux, Next JS, SCSS. I have experience with Jest, GraphQL, MaterialUI, TailwindCSS, Vite, SWR, Zustand, Swagger. I understand the principles of client-server interaction and RestApi architecture. I have minimal experience (pet projects) of writing backend on NestJs. I also know how to use Docker, docker-compose and Git, GitHub
